title: Old Ranked Info
body:
Im sorry if i placed this in the wrong discussion.
I need help so i guess it's the right one. I wanna know is it possible to see the Ranked info in the new client as we could in the old one. im talking about Games played, winrate, stats with every single champion as well as your Ranked stats in general throught the whole season.
Thank you

replies.body: I don't have any information on content being added to the updated client or insight on its development.  You make a fine point suggest sharing the feedback with the client devs over at the [client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards.  Thanks for the suggestion!
